question: What is easy to get into, but hard to get out of?
What gets broken without being held?
I'm tall when I'm young. I'm short when I'm old. I can light up your world. What am I?
What do you get when you mix lemons with gunpowder?
Mr.Red lives in the red house.Mr.Blue lives in the blue house. Mrs. Pink lives in the pink house? Who lives in the white house?
I have an eye, but can't see. I usually have to work with something in my eye. What am I?
Given them to the girls whenever, And they'll be best friends forever. Shiny, pretty stones, Bought with massive loans.
I am lighter than air but a hundred people cannot lift me. Careful, I am fragile. What am I?
When you take away the whole from me, there is always some left. What am I?
What type of cheese is made backwards?
What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
What goes through towns and over hills but never moves?
What time of day, when written in a capital letters, is the same forwards, backwards and upside down?
I am a kind of coat that can only be put on when wet. What am I?
Soft, hairy, from door to door. I am the pet that always stays on the floor. What am I?
What is it that is deaf, dumb and blind and always tells the truth?
I cannot be other than what I am, until the man who made me dies. Power and glory will fall to me, only when he last closes his eyes. Who am I?
What three letters change a boy into a man?
The last man on Earth received a phone call, who was the caller?
Tear off my skin and I won't cry but you will. What am I?
What is harder to catch the faster you run?
Never resting, never still, Silently moving from hill to hill, I do not walk, run or trot, But all is cool where I am not. What am I?
I cannot be burned in fire or drowned in water. What am I?
I'm a word that is not even strange. What am I?
What gets sharper the more you use it?
Fatherless and Motherless, born without sin. Roared when it entered the world, And never spoke again.What's it?
Who is the most foreign visitor you could imagine?
I go up and I go down, towards the sky and the ground. I'm present and past tense too, Let's go for a ride, me and you. What am I?
What can be heard in court or used to carry briefs?
If you are looking for I touch the Earth, I touch the sky, but if I touch you, you'll likely die. What am I?
Walk on the living, they don't even mumble, Walk on the dead, they mutter and grumble. What are they?
I have a head but never weeps. I have a bed but never sleep. I can run but never walks. I have a bank but no money. What am I?
Mr.and Mrs. Mustard have five daughters and each daughter has one brother. How many people are in the Mustard family?
Fashions change but what can a person wear that is never out of style?
If you drop a yellow hat in the Red Sea what does it become?
I cover what is real and hide what is true, But sometimes I bring out the courage in you. What am I?
Who is your mother's only sister's son's brother's aunt's daughter's sister's father?
What goes in the water black and comes out red?
What has 88 keys but can't open a single door?
What always goes to bed with its shoes on?
You cannot keep me until you have given me. What am I?
What type of house weighs the least?
What do you call a boomerang that doesn't come back?
I can fly but have no wings. I can cry but I have no eyes. Wherever I go, darkness follows me. What am I?
What jumps when it walks and sits when it stands?
What is black and white and is red all over?
Railroad Crossing, look out for the cars. Can you spell that, without any R's??
The answer for What type of dress can never be worn?
If you have it, you don't share it. If you share it, you don't have it. What is it??
A man shaves several times a day, yet he still has a beard. Who is this man?
It flies around all day but never goes anywhere? What is it?
